attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the recent killing of a Dad = trying to stop his home being vandalised, a goth couple attacked in a park and an 11 year old boy shot in the neck - the government MUST get tough - tougher and effective sanctions with parents forced to face up to their childrens behaviour. Adults should NOT be threatened by children.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
